templates.title: Onlook
templates.description: Onlook: An open-source AI-first design tool for visually building and editing React apps. Deploys web-client with Supabase integration.
templates.name: onlook

env.name: SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
env.label: Supabase Anon Key
env.description: Public anon key for Supabase client

env.name: SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
env.label: Supabase Service Role Key
env.description: Service role key for server-side auth

env.name: NEXTAUTH_SECRET
env.label: NextAuth Secret
env.description: Secret for NextAuth sessions (generate with openssl rand -base64 32)

volumes.label: Onlook Data Volume
volumes.description: Persistent volume for Onlook uploads and configs (optional; map to /data)

templates.note:
Setup Instructions:

  • Ensure .env files are configured in the repo clone (e.g., apps/web/client/.env).
  • Create external network if using: docker network create supabase_network_onlook-web.
  • Build and run: Access at http://your-host:3000 after deployment.
  • For full setup, see Onlook Docs.
